name: CHLOSAFE DIS. STRONG BLUE 450ML
description: "This Chlosafe drain cleaner & disposal clog remover is perfect for unclogging and maintaining drains in your facility's kitchen or bathroom. Its quick-acting formula is specifically designed to open slow drains and protect pipes against mineral buildup. Chlosafe drain cleaner & disposal clog remover contains no phosphates, and has a special ingredient to protect pipes from corrosion. It won't harm pipes when used overnight, and a final blast of hot water is all that's needed to clear away what's left of the clog. Whether you own a restaurant, dining hall, or healthcare facility, regular use of Chlosafe drain cleaner & disposal clog remover will keep your drains open and ready for use. Product Features • It deodorizes and cleans simultaneously. • It digests food & grease. • It stops drain clogging. • It increases drainage flow. • Non-fuming & fast-acting soluble powerful unblocker. • Used in homes, hotels, restaurants, kitchens, offices, etc. • ISO 9001 & ISO 14001 Certified. "

name: OXYCLEAN DRAIN CLEANER -BLUE 1LTR
description: "This Oxyclean drain cleaner & disposal clog remover is perfect for unclogging and maintaining drains in your facility's kitchen or bathroom. Its quick-acting formula is specifically designed to open slow drains and protect pipes against mineral buildup. Oxyclean drain cleaner & disposal clog remover contains no phosphates, and has a special ingredient to protect pipes from corrosion. It won't harm pipes when used overnight, and a final blast of hot water is all that's needed to clear away what's left of the clog. Whether you own a restaurant, dining hall, or healthcare facility, regular use of Oxyclean drain cleaner & disposal clog remover will keep your drains open and ready for use. Product Features • It deodorizes and cleans simultaneously. • It digests food & grease. • It stops drain clogging. • It increases drainage flow. • Non-fuming & fast-acting soluble powerful unblocker. • Used in homes, hotels, restaurants, kitchens, offices, etc. • ISO 9001 & ISO 14001 Certified "
